sen.j: 宮塚古墳（みやづかこふん）は埼玉県熊谷市広瀬608番地にある上円下方墳である。
sen.e: Miyazuka Tumulus is located at Hirose 608, Kumagaya City, Saitama Prefecture, which has a unique two-stepped form with a rectangular-shaped lower layer and a circular-shaped upper layer.
Miyazuka Tumulus is located at Hirose 608, Kumagaya City, Saitama Prefecture, which has a unique two-stepped form with a rectangular-shaped lower layer and a circular-shaped upper layer.
Miyazuka Tumulus is located at Hirose 608, Kumagaya City, Saitama Prefecture, which has a unique two-stepped form with a rectangular-shaped lower layer and a circular-shaped upper layer.

sen.j: 小規模古墳が密集する広瀬古墳群中の1基であり、7世紀後半の築造。
sen.e: Miyazuka Tumulus is one of the tombs among Hirose Tumulus Group consisting of many small-scale tumulus, and it is considered this tumulus was constructed in late 7th century.
Miyazuka Tumulus is one of the tombs among Hirose Tumulus Group consisting of many small-scale tumulus, and it is considered this tumulus was constructed in late 7th century.
Miyazuka Tumulus is one of the tombs among Hirose Tumulus Group consisting of many small-scale tumulus, and it is considered this tumulus was constructed in late 7th century.

sen.j: 東辺17メートル、西辺24メートル、高さ4.1メートル規模の方基状の土盛りに径約10メートル、高さ約2.50メートルの上円部が築成されている。
sen.e: This tumulus is constructed in a unique style, combining a rectilinear soil embankment in 17m (east side) by 24m (west side) with the height of 4.1m, and a circular shaped upper volume with the diameter in 10m with the height of 2.5m.

This tumulus is constructed in a unique style, combining a rectilinear soil embankment in 17m (east side) by 24m (west side) with the height of 4.1m, and a circular shaped upper volume with the diameter in 10m with the height of 2.5m.

This tumulus is constructed in a unique style, combining a rectilinear soil embankment in 17m (east side) by 24m (west side) with the height of 4.1m, and a circular shaped upper volume with the diameter in 10m with the height of 2.5m.

sen.j: 関東地方では珍しく、墳丘は上円下方の形態をとどめる。
sen.e: It is a rare case in Kanto region that this unique two-stepped tumulus with a circular upper and a rectangular bottom has preserved its original form.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。原文はそれほど長くありませんが、意味の異なる2文が１文になっており、「上円下方」の説明など英文では長くなりますので分割しました。
sen.e: It is a rare case in Kanto region that this unique two-stepped tumulus with a circular upper and a rectangular bottom has preserved its original form.
It is a rare case in Kanto region that this unique two-stepped tumulus with a circular upper and a rectangular bottom has preserved its original form.

sen.j: 元来円墳か方墳であったのが後世の耕作によって削られただけなのではないか、という見解がある。
sen.e: However, some study suggests that this tumulus was originally in a simple shape in either circular or rectangular volume, and in later years the volume of the tumulus was carved out when farmers used the surface ground of the tumulus for agricultural purpose.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。
sen.e: However, some study suggests that this tumulus was originally in a simple shape in either circular or rectangular volume, and in later years the volume of the tumulus was carved out when farmers used the surface ground of the tumulus for agricultural purpose.

However, some study suggests that this tumulus was originally in a simple shape in either circular or rectangular volume, and in later years the volume of the tumulus was carved out when farmers used the surface ground of the tumulus for agricultural purpose.

sen.j: 葺石の一部も残存している。
sen.e: Some of the surfacing stones have also remained until today.
Some of the surfacing stones have also remained until today.
Some of the surfacing stones have also remained until today.

sen.j: 山王と称せられる平地にあるため「山王塚」とも称する。
sen.e: This tumulus is also known as "Sannozuka" as it is located in the area called "Sanno" ("mountain king") with a level ground.
This tumulus is also known as 'Sannozuka' as it is located in the area called "Sanno" (mountain king) with a level ground.
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。括弧内の" "を削除しました。
sen.e: This tumulus is also known as 'Sannozuka' as it is located in the area called "Sanno" (mountain king) with a level ground.

sen.j: また、「お供え塚」の別称もある。
sen.e: It also has a nickname known as "Osonaezuka." ("offering mound")
It also has a nickname known as 'Osonaezuka' (offering mound).
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。括弧内の" "を削除しました。ピリオドの位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: It also has a nickname known as 'Osonaezuka' (offering mound).

tit.e: The designation as a historical place
The designation as a historical place
The designation as a historical place

sen.j: 1956年（昭和31年）5月15日、国の史跡に指定された。
sen.e: On May 15, 1956, this tumulus was designated as a national historical place.
On May 15, 1956, this tumulus was designated as a national historical place.
On May 15, 1956, this tumulus was designated as a national historical place.
